org.gearvrf.scene_objects

Class GVRWebViewSceneObject

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.gearvrf.GVRHybridObject
      • org.gearvrf.GVRSceneObject
        • org.gearvrf.scene_objects.GVRWebViewSceneObject
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Closeable, java.lang.AutoCloseable, GVRDrawFrameListener

    public class GVRWebViewSceneObject
extends GVRSceneObject
implements GVRDrawFrameListener
    Scene object that shows a web page, using the Android WebView.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      GVRWebViewSceneObject(GVRContext gvrContext, float width, float height, WebView webView)
      Shows a web page in a 2D, rectangular scene object.
      GVRWebViewSceneObject(GVRContext gvrContext, GVRMesh mesh, WebView webView)
      Shows a web page on a scene object with an arbitrarily complex geometry.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      Called each time a frame is drawn.

    • Constructor Detail

      • GVRWebViewSceneObject

        public GVRWebViewSceneObject(GVRContext gvrContext,
                             GVRMesh mesh,
                             WebView webView)
        Shows a web page on a scene object with an arbitrarily complex geometry.
        Parameters:
        gvrContext - current GVRContext
        mesh - a GVRMesh - see GVRContext.loadMesh(org.gearvrf.GVRAndroidResource) and GVRContext.createQuad(float, float)
        webView - an Android WebView

      • GVRWebViewSceneObject

        public GVRWebViewSceneObject(GVRContext gvrContext,
                             float width,
                             float height,
                             WebView webView)
        Shows a web page in a 2D, rectangular scene object.
        Parameters:
        gvrContext - current GVRContext
        width - the rectangle's width
        height - the rectangle's height
        webView - a WebView

    • Method Detail

      • onDrawFrame

        public void onDrawFrame(float frameTime)
        Description copied from interface: GVRDrawFrameListener
        Called each time a frame is drawn. Callbacks are called (from GVRViewManager.onDrawFrame()) in subscription-order, after any 'one shot' callbacks and before GVRScript.onStep().
        Specified by:
        onDrawFrame in interface GVRDrawFrameListener
        Parameters:
        frameTime - Seconds since the previous frame - see GVRContext.getFrameTime()
